title: Remove teacher login and add UPI QR code to donation section

requirements.text: Remove the Teacher role entirely from the system. This includes: removing the Teacher option from the RoleSelectionModal, removing teacher-specific role checks and routing in Header, Footer, Home, and App, removing or hiding the TeacherDashboard route, and ensuring only Parent and Admin roles remain functional throughout the application.

quotes: Teacher role/login will be completely removed, keeping only parent and admin logins

acceptanceCriteria: The role selection modal does not show a Teacher option
No teacher-specific navigation links appear in Header or Footer
The /teacher-dashboard route is removed or redirects away
Parent and Admin logins continue to work normally
No backend calls reference or assign the Teacher role

requirements.text: Display the uploaded Paytm UPI QR code image (kamerarajendra098@ptyes, Kamera Rajendraprasad) directly in the Donation page. Replace the existing UPI QR code placeholder with the actual QR code image stored as a static asset. Show the UPI ID 'kamerarajendra098@ptyes' below the QR code, and include a label such as 'Scan with any UPI app (Paytm, PhonePe, BHIM, Google Pay)'.

quotes: UPI QR code image (kamerarajendra098@ptyes) will be displayed directly in the donation section so users can scan it

acceptanceCriteria: The Donation page displays the actual Paytm UPI QR code image (not a placeholder)
The UPI ID 'kamerarajendra098@ptyes' is shown below the QR code
A label instructs users to scan with any UPI app
The QR code image is served from frontend/public/assets/generated/
The image is clearly visible and appropriately sized for scanning

constraints: Do not remove or modify the Admin role or admin login flow
Do not remove or modify the Parent role or parent login flow
The UPI QR code image must be served as a static frontend asset, not stored in the backend
nonGoals: Adding any new payment processing or integration
Modifying the backend data schema for user roles beyond removing teacher references
Changing the overall visual theme or layout of the app
